DIV.HEADER: A typical polymerization procedure was as follows . Cp 2 TiCl 2 ( 25 mg , 0.1 × 10 -3 M ) , Zn ( 7 mg , 0.1 × 10 -3 M ) and dioxane ( 0.5 mL ) were added to a 5 mL glass tube , and then the polymerization system was degassed using three freeze-vacuum-thaw cycles , and reacted for 10 min at room temperature . After the characteristic lime green color of Ti ( III ) appeared , GMA ( 0.355 g , 2.5 × 10 -3 M ) , CuBr 2 ( 23 mg , 0.1 × 10 -3 M ) and bpy ( 48 mg , 0.3 × 10 -3 M ) were added successively and the tube was degassed once again using three freeze-vacuum-thaw cycles . After precipitation twice by addition of the polymer solution into petroleum ether (30- 60 °C), hyperbranched PGMA-Br n (HPGMA-Br n) was obtained in a 54 % yield after filtration and drying in a vacuum oven at 30 °C overnight .
